unnormalised: IIT Delhi announces the commencement of its online application process for the academic year 2024-25, starting on 10/05/2024. Aspiring students can now apply for various postgraduate programs, including M.Tech, MBA, and Ph.D., through the official website. The deadline for submitting applications is 30/06/2024 at 5:00 PM IST.
normalised: I-I-T Delhi announces the commencement of its online application process for the academic year two thousand twenty four to twenty five, starting on tenth May two thousand twenty four. Aspiring students can now apply for various postgraduate programs, including M-Tech, M-B-A, and P-h-D, through the official website. The deadline for submitting applications is thirtieth June two thousand twenty four at five zero zero P-M I-S-T.

unnormalised: This year, IIT Delhi offers a total of 750 seats across all postgraduate disciplines. Eligibility criteria include a bachelor's degree with a minimum of 60% marks or a CGPA of 6.0 on a scale of 10. Selection will be based on the GATE score, followed by an interview for shortlisted candidates. For MBA admissions, CAT scores are also considered. Detailed information regarding the application procedure, eligibility requirements, and available programs can be found on the institute’s website.
normalised: This year, I-I-T Delhi offers a total of seven hundred and fifty seats across all postgraduate disciplines. Eligibility criteria include a bachelor's degree with a minimum of sixty percent marks or a C-G-P-A of six point zero on a scale of ten. Selection will be based on the G-A-T-E score, followed by an interview for shortlisted candidates. For M-B-A admissions, C-A-T scores are also considered. Detailed information regarding the application procedure, eligibility requirements, and available programs can be found on the institute’s website.

unnormalised: Applicants are advised to carefully read the instructions before filling out the online application form. A non-refundable application fee of Rs. 500 is applicable for general category candidates, while SC/ST/PwD candidates are required to pay Rs. 250. Documents such as mark sheets, degree certificates, and identity proof must be uploaded during the application process. For further queries, candidates can contact the admissions office at admissions@iitd.ac.in or call on 011-2659-7135 between 10:00 AM and 6:00 PM on weekdays.
normalised: Applicants are advised to carefully read the instructions before filling out the online application form. A non-refundable application fee of rupees five hundred is applicable for general category candidates, while S-C slash S-T slash P-w-D candidates are required to pay rupees two hundred and fifty. Documents such as mark sheets, degree certificates, and identity proof must be uploaded during the application process. For further queries, candidates can contact the admissions office at admissions at iitd dot a-c dot in or call on zero double one two six five nine seven one three five between ten zero zero A-M and six zero zero P-M on weekdays.
